about_the_game:
Polarize: Tales Among Shadows is a DLC expansion for Polarize, which changes things up, and provides a new and unique experience for old and new players.

RETURN TO THE OPTICAL ONCE AGAIN... BUT FROM A NEW PERSPECTIVE.

Play as Clara, a newcomer who unknowingly enters the world of the Optical. While being dropped into a world that is different from ours may seem daunting, you don't need to worry! You have the tools required to defend yourself, and escape!

WHAT IS THIS...?

Whilst, of course, you have the instant camera to your advantage, you also have a new tool to play around with...



With "The Lens", you are able to see things you wouldn't normally see... things like hallways that are usually blocked off by a wall, or pictures that are actually moving, or... lens-afflicted shadow people...?

Utilize "The Lens" to the best of your ability, for you'll find things that are hidden from the average human eye, such as lens-afflicted camera film (which could come in handy!), or secret collectables, or even healing items!

NEW LOCATIONS...

Welcome back to the Optical! Things have changed since you last visited... new places have been built, they aren't overseeing things nearly as much as they use to, and people like yourself have unwillingly admitted themselves here too!

  • The F-Stop welcomes you! Purchase Camera Film, Healing Items, and more things to use to your advantage during your time here!
  • The Cabins is back, but with a new coat of paint! Some of our residents came and went, but with that comes new opportunities for you to help out the townsfolk!
  • Take a trip down memory lane with The Aperture, after all, the light always shines... and you will ALWAYS find what you seek!

FEATURES:

  • An entirely new campaign for Polarize, which continues and elaborates on the story that the OG game built!
  • Plenty of hours of content, with many interesting takes on psychological horror and new gameplay mechanics!
  • Much more variety in environments in comparison to the main game, and a darker story!
  • An original soundtrack with MANY MORE SONGS, composed by Dante Garner!
  • The art style has been improved upon, and is a lot more visually appealing!

content_descriptors.notes: Polarize: Tales Among Shadows contains light gore, violence, jumpscares and other horror themes.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You could possibly go lower than these requirements, but if you want to run it at a playable framerate (on lowest settings) then these are the minimum.
